is_relevant_to_spatial_omics_analysis.description: Is the paper directly relevant to spatial omics data analysis, methods, or tools? (True/False)

primary_focus_area.description: The primary focus of the paper.

spatial_omics_technology_mentioned.description: List specific spatial omics technologies mentioned (e.g., Visium, Xenium, MERFISH, CODEX, IMC, Slide-seq, GeoMx, CosMx). Leave empty if none.

data_analysis_task.description: List the main spatial data analysis tasks performed or addressed. Leave empty if none directly applicable.

biological_context.description: Briefly describe the biological system or disease studied (e.g., 'human brain development', 'mouse cancer metastasis', 'plant root architecture').

summary_and_justification.description: A concise summary (2-3 sentences) of the paper's main contribution related to spatial omics and a brief justification for the 'is_relevant_to_spatial_omics_analysis' classification.
